name: Laura's mess with the academical titles
description:
Laura is an office Worker. Her job is to save every employee's name in a new Database.
As she finished she notices that she has written some of the academic titles in the wrong place. She doesn't want to do it all again, so she asks for your help. Help Laura clean up her mess and write a method which puts the Name and Title in the correct order. Incorrect examples from Lauras DB:
"Dr. Jane Welsh" is saved as "Jane Dr. Welsh".
"Ph.D. Arm Beld" is saved as "Arm Beld Ph.D."
"Dr. Dr. Mill Wakenstone" is saved as "Mill Dr. Dr. Wakenstone" Academic titles in the company are Dr., Ph.D., B.Sc., and M.Sc.
When there are multiple titles, the order doesn't matter
